file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-39-05-06 - BALL BEARING NO. 4 - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BALL BEARING No. 4 - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to do the inspection of split inner racer ball bearing No. 4. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY SPLIT INNER RACER BALL BEARING NO. ALL 72-39-05-200-801-A 4 - DETAILED INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-39-05 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-39-05-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SPLIT INNER RACER BALL BEARING NO. 4 - DETAILED INSPECTION A. General (1) To do the detailed inspection of the split inner racer ball bearing No. 4, see the instructions given in Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010. (2) For this inspection, it is necessary to remove the engine from the aircraft. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 71-00-00-000-801-A/400 ENGINE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-00-00-400-801-A/400 ENGINE - INSTALLATION Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. (2) Remove the engine ( AMM TASK 71-00-00-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 72-39-05 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Inspect (Detailed Inspection) Split Inner Racer Ball Bearing No. 4(Applicable for P/N 23061084 and 23064224) SUBTASK 220-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Do a detailed visual inspection of split inner racer ball bearing No. 4. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the engine ( AMM TASK 71-00-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 72-39-05 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A.
